description:
Despite what one feels politically, it should not be controversial or hard to condemn vandalism against innocent Americans. However, the left would rather be politically correct than morally correct. This is likely why Chuck Schumer refused to condemn the national Tesla attacks on innocent Americans and instead used it to further fuel division and claim “Elon Musk is a disaster for America.”


🚨Chuck Schumer is asked to denounce violence against Tesla — he REFUSES, then angrily attacks Elon Musk instead:

"I can't talk about Tesla, but Elon Musk is a disaster for America.” pic.twitter.com/TdeKPrAPBC
— Western Lensman (@WesternLensman)
title: Chuck Schumer Refuses To Condemn Tesla Terrorist Attacks, Says “Elon Musk is a disaster for America”

description:
Anyone who advocates against voter ID laws wants the exact opposite of a secure election, or they are painfully racist and naive. There is no in-between. However, it’s possible to be all of the above, and that is exactly what Sunny Hostin has proven.

Hostin implied that if voter ID becomes a requirement, then Black people and women will be too stupid to figure out how to vote.

Sunny Hostin: Many blacks and women will not be able to vote if we require ID pic.twitter.com/CxEgACUkoX
— End Wokeness (@EndWokeness) April 9, 2025
title: Sunny Hostin doesn't only think Black people can't figure out how to vote with ID, but women can't either.

description:
People with pronouns in their bio have proved to the world that they will affirm lies so long as it’s politically correct. This is even worse when it’s coming from the American media, which is why Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt ignores emails from reporters with pronouns in their signature because they do “not care about biological reality or truth and therefore cannot be trusted to write an honest story.”

It is official White House policy to IGNORE reporters' emails with pronouns in the signature👏

“I don’t respond to people who use pronouns in their signatures as it shows they ignore scientific realities and therefore ignore facts.” - @PressSec Karoline Leavitt
— Trump War Room (@TrumpWarRoom
title: WH press secretary has bad news for reporters who still have their pronouns in their bio in 2025: "It shows they ignore..."

description:
The tariff war with China may very well be necessary to prevent a physical war. Today’s show breaks it down.

“It could happen, but it’s not happening because of the tariffs,” Crowder said. "There has never been a point in human history aside from the Cold War where you have a world economic superpower with fundamentally different values and they don't clash. It’s human nature, and China hates everything that we are about.”

According to
title: Watch: COLD WAR 2.0? Will China Blink First, Or Will Trump?

description:
When will the left understand that calling half the country racist with no evidence is exactly the crap that cost them the election? Princeton professor Eddie Glaude has yet to realize that and claims Americans need to “grapple” with how they chose a “felon” over electing “a Black woman.”

MSNBC’s Eddie Glaude launches unhinged, self-righteous rant blasting Trump supporters as racist:

Says 78M Americans who voted for Trump would rather “destroy the Republic” than "elect a black woman." pic.twitter.com/E4oHMmQwnz
— Western Lensman (@WesternLensman) April 8, 2025
title: Angry MSNBC guest rants 78 million Americans would destroy the Republic because they "didn’t want to “elect a Black woman”

description:
Representative Jasmine Crockett wants illegal immigrants to stay in America so they can pick cotton. Eldridge Colby was confirmed as Undersecretary for Policy in the Department of Defense and you’ll never guess who voted against him. It was Mitch McConnell. Because, of course, it was. Colossal Biosciences claimed they are the first to “de-extinct” a species with the birth of two dire wolf puppies. Next, they want to bring back the wooly mammoth. Is this a good thing? Is this a bad thing? Are they really dire wolves or are they the genetic monstrosity that Michael Crichton was warning us about? We’ll let you know.

CROCKETT THE RACIST

<
title: COLD WAR 2.0? Will China Blink First Or Will Trump? (Sources)

description:
Seeing the success that Republicans had with a reality show host and successful businessman as president, Democrats are looking outside their comfort zone for their intellectual leader and have settled on a social media influencer to guide them. Rep. AOC. While the Instagram star also has a side hustle as a member of Congress, she is mostly known for her viral rants that entertain both the Left AND the Right, but in different ways. GOP Senator John Kennedy says that's a-ok with him.

As far as Kennedy is concerned, Rep. AOC is THE leader of the Democrat Party. Also, and this part is key...

“As I’ve said about her before, I think she’s the reason there are directions on a shampoo bottle.”

Get it? Because she is so dee-dee-dee, she needs to be told not to ingest the shampoo. I'm guessing the condit
title: GOP Senator savages AOC with zinger after zinger, declares launch of "Operation Let Her Speak"

description:
If Donald Trump's 104% reciprocal tariffs on communist China were a piece of viral content, it would be the video we are all about to enjoy, where it was on sight at... I don't know where this is. A Chinese restaurant somewhere on the planet. Where things were said, one thing led to another, and a bowl of hot water was thrown at someone. Never before have so few f*cks been squeezed into such a short clip.

The only context is that the video is at least four years old, but it's going viral again because that how Cousin Elon's X does.. Twitter 2.0 seems to favor fight videos lately in the algorithm. On behalf of those of us who hustle content for a living, I ain't mad at it.

Meanwhile in China... 🙈👊🇨🇳 pic.twitter.com/OuSxel12sI
title: 104% tariffs? Massive brawl erupts at a Chinese restaurant, and there is a lot to unpack
